```{r setup}
library(covidregionaldata)
library(knitr)
```

```{r, messages = FALSE, warnings = FALSE}
status <- check_data_sources(countries = c("afghanistan", "belgium", "brazil","canada",
                                           "colombia","germany","india", "italy", "russia",
                                           "uk", "usa"), worldwide = TRUE)
kable(status)
```
